scopeSummary.description: Full kitchen remodel with new cabinets, granite countertops, hardwood flooring, and updated appliances. Keep existing layout and plumbing locations.

specialRequirements: Soft-close hardware on all cabinets and drawers
GFCI protection for all countertop outlets

div01_general_requirements.name: General Requirements
div01_general_requirements.description: Project management, cleanup, and protection of existing surfaces.

items.specifications: Daily site coordination, scheduling, subcontractor management
Ram board or equivalent for adjacent areas during construction
items.notes: Protect hallway and adjacent living areas

items.specifications: End of day debris removal, dust control, HEPA vacuum
items.notes: Critical for occupied condo unit

items.specifications: Post-construction detail cleaning including windows, cabinets interior, appliances

div02_existing_conditions.name: Existing Conditions
div02_existing_conditions.description: Demolition of existing kitchen cabinets, countertops, flooring, and fixtures.

items.specifications: Remove all existing base and upper cabinets, haul away
items.notes: Includes island cabinet removal

items.specifications: Remove existing laminate countertops and backsplash
Remove existing vinyl flooring down to subfloor
items.notes: User confirmed existing floor is vinyl sheet

items.specifications: Disconnect sink, faucet, disposal, dishwasher for removal
Remove range, refrigerator, dishwasher, microwave - owner disposing
items.notes: Owner handling donation/disposal of old appliances

items.specifications: 10-yard dumpster, 1 week rental, kitchen demo debris
items.notes: May need to coordinate with building management for placement

div03_concrete.name: Concrete
div03_concrete.exclusionReason: No concrete work required. Existing slab in good condition. No structural changes planned.

div04_masonry.name: Masonry
div04_masonry.exclusionReason: No masonry work in kitchen remodel scope. No fireplace or brick features in this unit.

div05_metals.name: Metals
div05_metals.exclusionReason: No structural steel or metal framing required. No load-bearing changes in scope.

div06_wood_plastics_composites.name: Wood, Plastics, and Composites
div06_wood_plastics_composites.description: New kitchen cabinets, trim, and blocking for wall-mounted items.

items.specifications: Shaker style, maple, painted white, soft-close drawers and doors. Include lazy susan corner unit, 36-inch sink base, and 24-inch dishwasher opening.
items.notes: Customer prefers Kraftmaid or equivalent quality

items.specifications: Shaker style, maple, painted white, soft-close. 42-inch height extending to ceiling. Include glass-front accent doors over sink.
items.notes: Glass doors for displaying dishware

items.specifications: 60x36 inch island cabinet, shaker style matching uppers/lowers. Three drawers, two doors. 12-inch overhang on one side for seating.
items.notes: No plumbing in island per customer request

items.specifications: 84-inch tall, 24-inch wide pantry cabinet with pull-out shelves. Shaker style matching other cabinets.
items.notes: Located at southeast corner per plan

items.specifications: 3.5-inch crown molding to match cabinet style, painted to match cabinets
items.notes: Bridges gap between 42-inch cabinets and 9-foot ceiling

items.specifications: 3.5-inch colonial base, painted white to match cabinets
items.notes: Room perimeter minus cabinet/appliance areas

items.specifications: 2x4 blocking in wall cavities for secure upper cabinet mounting
items.notes: Required for 42-inch cabinets with heavy contents

div07_thermal_moisture.name: Thermal and Moisture Protection
div07_thermal_moisture.exclusionReason: No insulation or waterproofing work required. Interior kitchen remodel with no exterior wall modifications.

div08_openings.name: Openings
div08_openings.description: Hardware upgrades only. Existing door and window remain unchanged.

items.specifications: 5-inch brushed nickel bar pulls for drawers and base cabinet doors
items.notes: Customer selected Amerock Blackrock style

items.specifications: Brushed nickel knobs for upper cabinet doors, matching finish to pulls

div09_finishes.name: Finishes
div09_finishes.description: New flooring, wall paint, ceiling paint, and tile backsplash.

items.specifications: 5-inch plank engineered hardwood, medium oak, click-lock installation. Includes 7% waste factor.
items.notes: Brand options: Shaw, Mohawk, or equivalent. Customer prefers medium tone.

items.specifications: Moisture barrier underlayment for engineered hardwood over concrete
items.notes: Required per manufacturer specs for slab installation

items.specifications: Minor subfloor repair and leveling compound as needed after demo
items.notes: Allowance for unknown conditions under existing flooring

items.specifications: 2 coats, eggshell finish, Sherwin-Williams or Benjamin Moore. Color TBD by owner.
items.notes: Walls only - ceiling separate line item

items.specifications: 1 coat flat white ceiling paint, touch-up after recessed light installation
Patch holes from cabinet removal, electrical work. Texture match existing orange peel.
items.notes: Extent unknown until demo complete

items.specifications: 3x6 white ceramic subway tile, gray grout, 18-inch height. Behind sink and range areas.
items.notes: Classic brick pattern layout

items.specifications: Thinset mortar, grout, grout sealer for backsplash tile installation
Wall-mounted, brushed nickel finish to match cabinet hardware
items.notes: Optional - customer to confirm

div11_equipment.name: Equipment
div11_equipment.description: All new kitchen appliances, mid-range tier.

items.specifications: 36-inch french door, counter depth, stainless steel. ~22 cu ft capacity. Mid-range brand (GE, Whirlpool, Frigidaire Gallery).
items.notes: Delivery includes basic install. Owner responsible for water line connection if ice maker desired.

items.specifications: 30-inch freestanding gas range, 5-burner, stainless steel, convection oven. Mid-range brand.
items.notes: Existing gas line in place - verified by customer

items.specifications: 24-inch built-in, stainless steel front, 44dB or quieter, 3rd rack. Mid-range brand (Bosch 300 series or equivalent).
items.notes: Quiet operation important for open floor plan

items.specifications: 30-inch wall-mount chimney hood, stainless steel, 400+ CFM, LED lights, 3-speed.
items.notes: Venting to existing duct - verify during demo

items.specifications: Countertop microwave, 1.6 cu ft, stainless steel exterior, 1100W.
items.notes: Countertop unit - not built-in or over-range. Location on counter near pantry.

items.specifications: Level 2 granite (e.g., New Venetian Gold, Santa Cecilia, Giallo Ornamental), 1.25-inch thick, eased edge profile. Includes sink cutout with polished edges.
items.notes: Customer to visit slab yard for final selection

items.specifications: Matching granite to perimeter, includes overhang support brackets for seating side
items.notes: 12-inch overhang on seating side requires corbels or steel supports

items.specifications: 32-inch double bowl, 18-gauge stainless steel, undermount with sound dampening
items.notes: 60/40 split preferred by customer

div13_special_construction.name: Special Construction
div13_special_construction.exclusionReason: No special construction elements (clean rooms, pools, saunas, etc.) applicable to kitchen remodel scope.

div14_conveying_equipment.name: Conveying Equipment
div14_conveying_equipment.exclusionReason: No elevators, dumbwaiters, or conveying systems in kitchen remodel scope.

div21_fire_suppression.name: Fire Suppression
div21_fire_suppression.exclusionReason: No modifications to existing fire suppression system. Condo building has central sprinkler system managed by HOA.

div22_plumbing.name: Plumbing
div22_plumbing.description: New fixtures on existing rough-in locations. No plumbing relocation.

items.specifications: Single-hole, pull-down sprayer, stainless steel or chrome finish. Delta, Moen, or Kohler.
items.notes: Customer prefers pull-down vs pull-out style

items.specifications: 3/4 HP, continuous feed, Insinkerator Evolution or equivalent. Includes power cord kit.
New P-trap, tailpiece, drain fittings for double bowl sink with disposal connection
items.notes: Replace all drain components for warranty

items.specifications: Braided stainless steel supply lines, 3/8 compression fittings, hot and cold
Braided dishwasher supply line with dedicated shutoff valve
1/4-inch copper or braided line for refrigerator ice maker with saddle valve or dedicated stop
items.notes: Customer may defer - fridge works without ice maker

div23_hvac.name: Heating, Ventilating, and Air Conditioning (HVAC)
div23_hvac.exclusionReason: No HVAC modifications required. Existing central HVAC system adequate for kitchen. Range hood vents to existing duct.

div25_integrated_automation.name: Integrated Automation
div25_integrated_automation.exclusionReason: No smart home or building automation systems included in base scope. Customer may add later.

div26_electrical.name: Electrical
div26_electrical.description: Updated lighting to LED, under-cabinet lights, outlet upgrades, and appliance circuits.

items.specifications: 6-inch recessed LED, 3000K warm white, dimmable, IC rated for insulation contact
items.notes: Layout: 2 over sink, 2 over island, 2 over range/prep area

items.specifications: Junction box and support for island pendant lights. Fixtures provided and selected by owner.
items.notes: Owner purchasing pendants separately - we provide rough-in only

items.specifications: Hardwired LED strip, 3000K, with low-profile transformer. Connected to dimmer switch.
items.notes: North and east wall upper cabinet runs

items.specifications: 20A GFCI outlets, replace all existing countertop outlets. White finish.
items.notes: Code requirement for kitchen countertop receptacles

items.specifications: Verify existing 40A/240V circuit for gas range ignition. Replace receptacle if worn.
items.notes: Gas range still needs electric for ignition and clock

items.specifications: Verify 20A dedicated circuit for refrigerator, NOT on GFCI per code
items.notes: GFCI not required for fridge - nuisance tripping concern

items.specifications: Lutron Caseta or equivalent LED-compatible dimmers. One for recessed, one for under-cabinet.
items.notes: Single-pole locations

items.specifications: Air switch mounted in countertop or standard wall switch near sink
items.notes: Customer preference TBD - air switch is cleaner look

div27_communications.name: Communications
div27_communications.exclusionReason: No communications wiring (data, phone, cable) modifications in kitchen scope. Existing building infrastructure adequate.

div28_electronic_safety_security.name: Electronic Safety and Security
div28_electronic_safety_security.exclusionReason: No security system modifications required. Building has central security managed by HOA.

div31_earthwork.name: Earthwork
div31_earthwork.exclusionReason: Interior remodel only - no earthwork, excavation, or site work applicable.

div32_exterior_improvements.name: Exterior Improvements
div32_exterior_improvements.exclusionReason: Interior remodel only - no exterior improvements in scope.

div33_utilities.name: Utilities
div33_utilities.exclusionReason: No site utility work required. Condo unit - all utilities handled by building infrastructure.

spatialRelationships.layoutNarrative:
The kitchen is a 14x14 foot square room with 9-foot ceilings in a condo unit on the 3rd floor. Entering through a 3-foot door on the south wall (positioned 2 feet from the southwest corner, swinging inward), you face the center island directly ahead, approximately 5 feet from the entry.

The north wall is the primary work wall featuring a centered 4-foot window with a 32-inch double-bowl undermount sink directly below it. Upper cabinets flank both sides of the window (42-inch height, extending to ceiling with crown molding). Lower cabinets run continuously along the north wall from corner to corner, interrupted only by the 36-inch sink base cabinet and 24-inch dishwasher opening immediately to the right of the sink.

The east wall continues the L-shaped cabinet configuration. Starting from the northeast corner: the 36-inch counter-depth refrigerator sits in a recessed alcove (2-inch gap to corner for air circulation), followed by 36 inches of counter space with upper and lower cabinets, then the 30-inch gas range centered on that wall with a stainless steel wall-mounted range hood above (no upper cabinets above range to allow for hood and clearance), then more counter space continuing to the southeast corner where the 84-inch tall pantry cabinet is positioned.

The west wall has no cabinets - this is the circulation zone. The entry door is located on the south end of this wall, with open floor space for traffic flow between the entry, island, and the rest of the condo.

The 60x36 inch center island is positioned 42 inches from the north (sink) wall and 36 inches from the east (range) wall, with a 12-inch countertop overhang on the west side providing seating for two bar stools. This creates an efficient work triangle: sink to range = 8 feet diagonal, range to refrigerator = 6 feet, refrigerator to sink = 7 feet (total 21 feet, within the ideal 13-26 foot range for kitchen efficiency).

Lighting layout: Six 6-inch recessed LED lights are positioned in a roughly 2x3 grid pattern - two centered above the sink work area (north), two centered above the island, and two above the range/prep area (east). Three pendant light junction boxes are centered above the island in a row running north-south for task lighting. Under-cabinet LED strips run along the underside of the north and east wall upper cabinets (14 linear feet total), providing task lighting for counter work surfaces.

stove.location: east wall, centered between fridge alcove and corner

dishwasher.location: north wall, immediately right of sink base cabinet

clarificationQuestions.question: What's your full project address including unit number?

Looking at your floor plan, I see an L-shaped cabinet configuration along the north and east walls. Can you confirm: is the refrigerator in the northeast corner, and is the range centered on the east wall?
clarificationQuestions.answer: Yes that's right. Fridge in the corner, stove on the wall next to it with some counter space between them.

clarificationQuestions.question: What cabinet style and finish are you looking for?
clarificationQuestions.answer: Shaker style cabinets, maple wood, but painted white. I definitely want soft close on everything - doors and drawers.

clarificationQuestions.question: For countertops, what material were you thinking? And any preference on edge profile?
clarificationQuestions.answer: Granite, something mid-range, not the cheapest but don't need the exotic stuff. Simple eased edge, nothing fancy.

clarificationQuestions.question: Are you keeping the existing plumbing locations, or do you want to move the sink or add plumbing to the island?
clarificationQuestions.answer: Keep everything where it is. No plumbing in the island - just want it for prep space and seating.

clarificationQuestions.question: What level of appliances are you targeting - budget, mid-range, or high-end? Any specific brands you like?
clarificationQuestions.answer: Mid-range is fine. Stainless steel everything. The range has to be gas - we have a gas line already. No strong brand preference, maybe GE or Whirlpool.

clarificationQuestions.question: For lighting, are you thinking recessed cans, pendants over the island, or both? And do you want under-cabinet lighting?
clarificationQuestions.answer: Both - recessed for general light and some nice pendants over the island. I'll pick out the pendants myself. And yes, definitely under cabinet lights, makes such a difference.

clarificationQuestions.question: Last question - what's your ideal timeline to start, and is there any hard deadline?
clarificationQuestions.answer: Would love to start early February if possible. No hard deadline, but hoping to be done before Easter so maybe 6-8 weeks?

lowConfidenceItems.reason: East wall type uncertain - marked as interior but could be load-bearing based on building structure. Recommend verification during demo.
Paper towel holder is inferred as typical inclusion - customer should confirm if desired.
Ice maker line may be deferred by customer - refrigerator functions without it.

missingData: Exact ceiling height confirmed by measurement (assumed 9ft based on typical condo)
Existing flooring type under vinyl (assumed adequate subfloor)
Exact pendant light fixtures (owner selecting separately)
